messages.message:
Hi team, I'm trying to use `feature_flags_utils` in `shared-utils/py-utils/license-utils/src/py/instabase/license_utils/license.py`. I tried adding it to the bazel file here (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/70763/files#diff-94fd01c71efa312e14bf6893ec950bbe7ec5bc91ac44840523225e48ae12c399R32) but I got a build failure (`[2025-05-20T01:10:35.449Z] ERROR: /instabase_dir/shared-utils/py-utils/license-utils/src/py/instabase/license_utils/BUILD.bazel:4:11: no such package 'webserver/shared/src/py/instabase/shared': BUILD file not found in any of the following directories. Add a BUILD file to a directory to mark it as a package.`)

How can I import it correctly?
FYI, feature flags aren't supported in celery-app-tasks.
You can't use feature flags there.
